Twitter & Clojure

18 Jan 2012

Goal

Write some simple Clojure application that fetches the followers of a set of twitter users in a certain interval of time. Provide the data via a RESTful JSON API and graph it in the browser with raphael.js.

Steps

  1. Setup Clojure web application
  2. Find a way to make Twitter API calls with that
  3. Map this to own API
